nekomusiccli.screen.warning.title: NekoMusic §cWarning
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.title: NekoMusic Config
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.option.musi: Music Cache Max Size (MB), -1 = Unlimited, 0 = Disable. Requires restart.
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.option.imgC: Cover Cache Max Size (MB), -1 = Unlimited, 0 = Disable. Requires restart.
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.option.cach: Cache Path. Requires restart. If empty, the default path (".minecraft/cache/nekomusiccli") will be used.
§cPlease make sure that the path is valid and writable. Don't use any directory that may contain any other files, as they might be deleted by the mod.
§eTip: If you are using multi platforms or your game is installed in a removable disk, you may want to use a relative path or environment variables.
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.option.allm: This allows you to use this mod in servers that use Coloryr's AllMusic. Requires restart.
§cCurrently only music playback is supported, the hud will be omitted. And this is not guaranteed to work properly.
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.option.bann: Servers in this list will not be able to send music to you.
§ePlease note that changing this option here will not take effect until you rejoined the server. If you want to change it immediately, please use the shortcut defined in keybindings.
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.option.musi: Response Size Limit (MB), -1 = Unlimited. Should be more than 10 if you set a positive value. Requires restart.
§eThis might help you mitigate some wrongly configured servers (e.g. accidentally send a 1GB music) that send too much data, but not guaranteed to work in all cases.
§eThis should not be considered as a security feature. If your server send large data on purpose to break the client, personally I would recommend you to find a better server.
text.autoconfig.nekomusiccli.option.imgR: Same as above, but for cover image.
hud.nekomusic.failed_to_load_image: Failed to load cover image, please check your network connection.
hud.nekomusic.update.failed: Failed to update HUD, this should not happen, please report this to the developer with full log.
player.nekomusic.manager.disposed: MusicManager called after being disposed, this should not happen, please report this to the developer with full log.
player.nekomusic.music.null: Music is null, this should not happen, please report this to the developer with full log.
player.nekomusic.stream.failed: Failed to get music stream, please check your network connection.
player.nekomusic.play.failed: Failed to play music: Unknown error. If you believe this is a bug, please report this to the developer with full log.
player.nekomusic.decode.failed: Failed to decode music, perhaps the music is corrupted or unsupported.
player.nekomusic.streaming.unavailable: Streaming unavailable for this format, downloading the whole music, this may take a while...
volume.nekomusic.set.failed: Failed to set volume. This should not happen, please report this to the developer with full log.
cache.nekomusic.read_failed: Failed to read cache record: %d , a new record will be created. This might be caused by a corrupted record, please check if your cache directory is valid in "Mods -> NekoMusic Client -> Config -> Advanced -> Cache Path".
